article: liberal dutch lawmaker ayaan hirsi ali , who has been threatened for her criticism of islam and who wrote the scenario for slain filmmaker theo van gogh 's film `` submission '' , returned to parliament tuesday after more than two months in hiding .
abstract: dutch lawmaker who was threatened over film returns to parliament
